function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mixing of large numbers of individuals for data collection (quantitative research)","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in the research population","Mitigation":"Use of online questionnaires to minimize physical contact and reduce the likelihood of disease transmission","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, digital data collection tools","People":"Research respondents, data collectors","Owner":"Research team, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Face-to-face interviews with project managers, contractors, and site engineers (qualitative research)","Impact":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases through close contact with interview participants","Mitigation":"Use of virtual interviews, personal protective equipment (PPE) for in-person interviews, and adherence to health guidelines","Technologies":"Video conferencing tools, virtual interview platforms","People":"Interview participants, research team","Owner":"Research team, interview coordinators"}]}
